entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
